What makes this Spanish Thesaurus unique?

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The fact that you may enter set phrases, not only single terms, as valid entries

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The fact that you may obtain synonyms of parts of speech usually not included in other thesauruses, such as exclamations, prepositional phrases and idiomatic verbs. Even proverbs have their synonyms!
